com.netflix.msl.crypto
Class SessionCryptoContext

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.msl.crypto.SymmetricCryptoContext
      com.netflix.msl.crypto.SessionCryptoContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICryptoContext
public class SessionCryptoContext
extends SymmetricCryptoContext

This is a convenience class for constructing a symmetric crypto context from a MSL session master token.

Constructor Summary
SessionCryptoContext(MslContext ctx, MasterToken masterToken)
          Construct a new session crypto context from the provided master token.
SessionCryptoContext(MslContext ctx, MasterToken masterToken, String identity, SecretKey encryptionKey, SecretKey hmacKey)
          Construct a new session crypto context from the provided master token.
 
Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class com.netflix.msl.crypto.SymmetricCryptoContext
decrypt, encrypt, sign, unwrap, verify, wrap
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

SessionCryptoContext

public SessionCryptoContext(MslContext ctx,
                            MasterToken masterToken)
                     throws MslMasterTokenException
Construct a new session crypto context from the provided master token.

Parameters:
ctx - MSL context.
masterToken - the master token.
Throws:
MslMasterTokenException - if the master token is not trusted.

SessionCryptoContext

public SessionCryptoContext(MslContext ctx,
                            MasterToken masterToken,
                            String identity,
                            SecretKey encryptionKey,
                            SecretKey hmacKey)
Construct a new session crypto context from the provided master token. The entity identity and keys are assumed to be the same as what is inside the master token, which may be untrusted.

Parameters:
ctx - MSL context.
masterToken - master token. May be untrusted.
identity - entity identity.
encryptionKey - encryption key.
hmacKey - HMAC key.
